snippet: No. 1 Alabama’s defense was battered by Louisiana State for 435 yards but a late drive led by quarterback A J McCarron helped the Crimson Tide stay undefeated.
abstract: Alabama defeats Louisiana State, 21-17, in college football; Alabama remains unbeaten at 9-0.
lead_paragraph: No. 1 Alabama’s defense was battered by Louisiana State for 435 yards but a late drive led by quarterback A J McCarron helped the Crimson Tide stay undefeated.

headline.seo: Late Drive Lifts Alabama Over L.S.U.
headline.main: Touchdown in Final Minute Saves Alabama and Stuns Death Valley
headline.print_headline: Touchdown in Final Minute Saves Alabama and Stuns Death Valley
